DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : BRASILIA ; PAYING THE PIPER
DOC.TEXT: An investigative panel probing corruption in the Brazilian legislature is scheduled to release its final report Saturday , and at least two_dozen lawmakers are facing near certain expulsion from congress . The report concludes a nearly four-month investigation into a huge kickback and influence-peddling scheme in which ranking members of the congressional budget committee allegedly pocketed millions of dollars of taxpayers ' money in exchange for writing budget items favoring pet projects for select politicians and businesses . The panel is expected to recommend censure or expulsion of up_to 30 legislators , who may later face criminal charges . A separate investigation into alleged misdeeds by construction companies is also scheduled to get underway in the next few months .
